## Permissions Needed

Which Plugin API permissions would this need?

- [ ] `read-output` - Read PTY output
- [ ] `read-session` - Read session metadata
- [ ] `read-commands` - Read command history
- [ ] `write-clipboard` - Write to clipboard
- [ ] `render-panel` - Render side panel
- [ ] `keyboard-shortcuts` - Register shortcuts
- [ ] `toolbar-buttons` - Add toolbar buttons
